author: Tracy Miller
text:
The City of DeLand, FL is interested in utility billing and customer service issues and resolutions and how it was approached and executed.  Additionally, DeLand would be interested to know if any of you have performed a peer review of other utilities and if so how did you do that?  Please respond here or directly to tmiller@transformgov.org.  
Tracy Miller  
Florida Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation
title: Benchmarking on Utility Billing and Customer Service
